subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After months of speculation and what-if drama, free agent center Mats Sundin decided to take the offer that has been waiting for him since July and signed with the Vancouver Canucks on Thursday.
snippet: After months of speculation and what-if drama, free agent center Mats Sundin decided to take the offer that has been waiting for him since July and signed with the Vancouver Canucks on Thursday.
